Name: FrothyWiFi.CYNHUD
Description: Adds an easily customizable (through Mod Settings) message to your HUD and useful game commands.

ConVars.Name: ch_hud_message
ConVars.HelpString: The message CYNHUD will display on your HUD.

ConVars.Name: ch_hud_message_pos
ConVars.HelpString: The position of the message CYNHUD will display on your HUD. (Bottom, Middle, Top)
